alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Onslow and southern Duplin Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1215 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Willard, or near Wallace, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Wallace, Rose Hill, Richlands, Beulaville, Cypress Creek, Catherine Lake, Chinquapin, Petersburg, Albert J Ellis Airport, Richlands South, Magnolia, Greenevers, Lyman, Haws Run and Teachey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
